cn.description:
欢迎来到Vostok - 你的终极故事编辑器和拼贴制作工具，旨在提升你在社交媒体上的存在感！Vostok可以轻松将你的创意转化为令人惊叹的专业级帖子和故事。

无论你是博主、摄影师，还是喜欢在社交媒体上记录生活点滴的人，Vostok都为你提供了一切所需，打造引人注目的内容。我们时尚且用户友好的应用巧妙地融合了你对摄影和讲故事的热爱，为你提供了一个动态的平台，展示你的惊奇时刻。

Vostok以极简主义风格自豪，成为你释放创意的完美空间。多种模板、贴纸和特效尽在指尖，让你打造独特的故事，展现个性。

但Vostok不仅提供创意自由，更注重简便性。我们直观的界面使得编辑和分享内容变得轻而易举，让你有更多时间专注于创作引人入胜的故事，让你的粉丝喜爱。

不要犹豫！立刻开始你的Vostok之旅，打造引人入胜的帖子和故事，留下深刻印象！

以下是我们的一些功能预览：

· 200+社交媒体设计模板
· 支持西里尔字母的独家字体
· 450+独特贴纸
· 照片大气灰尘和颗粒特效
· 多种背景：纸张纹理、大理石、渐变、颜色
· 无广告，无需订阅
· 支持深色模式

被Apple评为2019年最佳应用之一。

拥有200多个模板，Vostok是你打造出众社交媒体内容的工具箱。

我们热切期待你的想法和反馈。
通过hello@vostokapp.ru与我们联系，或在Instagram直接向我们发送消息，帐号为@vostokapp。

cn.description:
感谢您使用FocusDots！这是一个简单的时间管理应用，将提高您的工作效率。

有时候，保持注意力集中在任务上可能并不容易。FocusDots是一个精美设计的计时器，旨在提高您对任务的专注，并丢弃可能分散注意力的活动。

FocusDots是一个简单的时间管理应用，包含四个简单的步骤：

1) 决定要完成的单个任务。
2) 启动FocusDots并在计时器结束前（25分钟）专注于该任务。
3) 休息一下（5分钟）。
4) 完成四个Dots后，休息更长时间（15分钟）。

特点：
- 优雅的极简设计
- 每日总结
- 精美设计主题
- 激励引用语
- 可为您的任务自定义计时器时长

感谢您选择FocusDots！我们由衷感谢您的支持，希望我们的应用能帮助您提高生产力和时间管理技巧。如果您有任何反馈或建议，我们非常乐意听取！

语音到文本：语音到文本是强大的实时听写解决方案。基于最新的人工智能并使用强大的语音识别引擎，此听写应用程序可将您的语音实时准确地转录为文本。

干净优雅的设计，加上不间断的语音识别和其他功能，让您可以放松并专注于您的想法和内容。

使用我们的应用程序，您的文字将被神奇地转录成文本，而无需您触摸键盘。现在你可以用你的声音来创造你的话语了！

稍后轻松共享您的文本和音频文件！ （适用于 Evernote、Dropbox、Google Drive、OneDrive、Facebook、Twitter、Snapchat、WhatsApp 和其他 iOS 支持的共享应用程序。）


无论您是专业作家、医生、律师、残疾人或因某种原因无法使用传统打字的人，语音转文本：语音转文本应用程序将迅速解决您的转录问题并帮助您实现今天的写作目标！



这款出色的语音转文本应用程序可让您使用 iPhone/iPad 做更多事情：

・更长的记录时间：
 - 连续听写最多 1 小时。

・无限制的保存和编辑

・可以直接编辑转录的文本。
・个人和团体转录的理想选择
・对语音识别的后台支持。
・设备上的语音识别。


• 语音识别支持 ​​59 种语言和口音。
• 在社交网络上分享您的文字。
• 将您的文本复制到其他应用程序。
• 以电子邮件或短信形式发送您的文本。

• 单击即可立即创建 PDF。
• 立即将笔记、报告、信件的文本转换为 PDF
•
► 目前支持的语音识别语言：阿拉伯语、粤语、加泰罗尼亚语、中文、克罗地亚语、捷克语、丹麦语、荷兰语、英语、芬兰语、法语、德语、希腊语、希伯来语、印地语、匈牙利语、印度尼西亚语、意大利语、日语、韩语、马来语、挪威语、博克马尔语、波兰语、葡萄牙语、罗马尼亚语、俄语、上海语、斯洛伐克语、西班牙语、瑞典语、泰语、土耳其语、乌克兰语、越南语。


超级简单：只需单击麦克风并开始听写。无需登录或注册

您可以使用简单的语音命令添加新段落、标点符号、笑脸和其他特殊字符。


订阅价格和条款

我们提供三种自动续订订阅选项：

取消将在当前订阅的最后一天后的第二天生效。

cn.description:
MagicKit AI – 全能设备与实用工具包

MagicKit AI 是一款完整的实用工具应用，旨在帮助您监控设备状态、优化性能，并从一个便捷界面访问日常工具。专为 iOS 打造，MagicKit AI 集合了多种核心功能，同时保护您的隐私并节省电池。

设备与系统工具：
• 电池状态：查看当前电量和充电状态
• 存储使用情况：分析可用与已用空间
• 设备信息：查看基本硬件与系统详情
• 运行时间监控：了解设备持续运行时间
• 电池使用建议：获取实用省电技巧
• 照片清理：检测并删除重复或相似照片以释放空间

网络工具：
• 网速测试：测量您的互联网连接速度
• Wi-Fi 信息：查看网络名称、IP 地址和连接状态
• IP 查询：查看公网 IP 的地理位置

实用工具：
• 单位换算器：支持多种单位互转
• 货币转换器：实时汇率与换算
• 日期时间计算器：支持工作日差值计算
• 时区转换器：全球时间转换，含夏令时支持
• 倒计时与提醒：创建美观倒计时，可自定义提醒与重复事件
• Magic 计数器：多项目统计追踪，含连续天数与数据统计
• 二维码扫描：快速识别二维码
• 文档扫描：高质量扫描保存文档
• 指南针与水平仪：使用设备传感器测量方向与水平
• 屏幕方向锁定：在应用内锁定屏幕方向
• 音频检测仪：通过麦克风测量环境音量
• 剪贴板管理器：访问并管理当前会话复制内容
• 手电筒：开启设备手电筒
• 亮度调节：直接在应用内调整屏幕亮度

功能亮点：
• 简洁易用的向导式界面
• 无广告，无内购
• 轻量节能
• 兼容所有 iOS 设备
• 工具持续更新添加
• 注重隐私与性能设计

适用人群：
• 设备状态监控与性能优化
• 日常换算与测量任务
• 文档与二维码扫描
• 照片清理释放空间
• 倒计时提醒管理
• 习惯追踪与进度统计
• 快速工具访问（如手电筒、亮度）
• 简易网络诊断

立即下载 MagicKit AI，用一个智能强大的工具包简化您的日常任务！

cn.description:
这是一部带着奇幻色彩的异域传说。统治大漠的“旧王朝”已经崩溃，各个部落之间开始了无止境的相互攻伐，在这乱世背后，还潜藏着一个更大、更为黑暗的深渊……



在这片幻想的沙漠中，玩家将有机会扮演各种角色，在开放世界中探索。



【游戏特色】

- 开放世界，整个世界在规则演算下不断变化，每次游戏都会是不同的体验；
- 世界中存在许多谜题等待你去解开，多样的挑战BOSS，对应丰厚的奖励；
- 多周目，丰富的职业角色设定，大量可拓展的Build；
- 玩家可以招募士兵，培养自己的部队，在这片大陆上和敌方展开大规模攻防战；
- AI叛逃系统，经营势力与NPC之间的关系，获取部落称号！

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.releaseNotes:
【修复&优化】
1、修复了独孤剑一地下擂台事件中个别剧情被跳过的问题；
2、优化了部分事件文本。

【模组新增】
1、【内容扩展】大侠修仙传（新）——作者：小龙鱼
该版本是全新重置版本，不与老档兼容；
核心玩法：境界机制、五行灵根、小师妹彩蛋、常驻的每日拍卖会。

【模组调整&修复】
1、【体验调整】江湖逍遥：
     新增道具“邀请坠饰”、“无敌开关”。
2、【体验调整】一统江湖：
     增加开局可用特征点数；
     取消“典籍”物品的使用限制。
3、【体验调整】社会废人钟某【新】：
     变身铁面人时立绘调整为铁面大侠，装备传国玉玺可变身为皇帝大侠立绘称帝的我；
     武器衣服级别更改为红色，修改了衣服的合成配方，目前更加容易获取专属衣服；
     添加专属衣服新效果，对心魔必定一击必杀；
     添加一般理性新效果，一般理性装备时会根据自身福缘减少心魔伤害，会消耗铜钱反弹受到的心魔伤害，心魔不再能触发部分内功效果。
4、【体验调整】社会废人钟某其他配置：
     新增了后山矿产万年玄冰。
5、【内容扩展】大侠修仙传（体验版）：
     尝试修复部分存档无法进入游戏的问题。
cn.description:
随时随地，行侠仗义！《大侠立志传》是半瓶神仙醋开发的开放世界武侠RPG游戏。这是一款像素版江湖生存模拟器，你将扮演一个初出茅庐的市井小人物，体验多样身份，在江湖中摸爬滚打，最终脱颖而出。

【游戏特色】
- 百余种武学功法，拳掌刀剑，枪棍音律，内外兼修，皆可自行搭配。成为十字坡剑圣，亦可精通百家所长。
- 多分支走向。游戏中没有真正意义上的主线，在充满抉择的江湖中从心选择吧。
- 丰富的NPC交互玩法，结交五都侠客（侣），游走于盘杂的人际势力，经营你的江湖关系网。
- 奇遇和危险并存的真实武林。江湖并非非黑即白，遇事不一定要用拳头解决，采取多种方式应对，并坦然接受不一样的结局。
- 充满烟火气息的像素武侠世界。游戏中有着自然流逝的时间，各色NPC都有自己独立的行为AI。

《笼中窥梦》是一款「视错觉」解谜游戏，由两人工作室Optillusion开发完成。

游戏的内容全部包含在一个神秘的立方体中，立方体的每个面都是一个独立的世界：工厂，灯塔，游乐园，教堂等等，他们之间看似毫不相关，实则交错万千，充满了意想不到的关联……

【烧脑视错觉解谜】
发挥你的脑洞与想象力，找到那些平凡场景与物体之间的联系，产生意想不到的奇妙互动，拼接，然后见证奇迹诞生。

【收集照片拼凑故事】
谜题背后，游戏还有一个等待着被玩家们发现并反转的故事。通过收集照片拼凑故事，试着解开它隐藏的真相吧。

【多重提示杜绝卡关】
游戏包含多种解谜引导机制，包括最基础的「视觉引导」，帮助你快速定位关键物品；而「文字提示」则可以帮你整理解谜思路；最后还有「视频提示」，用终极手段保证你绝不会卡关。

【拿下奖章证明实力】
游戏拥有 15 个成就，每个成就都对应着一个根据剧情设计的独特奖章。如果你是解谜游戏达人，那就用这些奖章来证明自己吧~

【联系我们】
玩家1群：626570283（已满）
玩家2群：912766585
官方微博：@心动网络 、@笼中窥梦-Moncage
官方邮箱：moncagethegame@gmail.com

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
hk.description:
********************
勇者鬥惡龍天空系列的第二作，《勇者鬥惡龍V》隆重登場！
歷經祖孫三代的宏大故事將在智能手機上復蘇！
感受主人公所經歷的“波瀾萬丈的人生”！
本作是一次性買斷的！
在下載後，不需要再支付任何費用。
********************
◆序言
主人公是和父親帕帕斯一起在世界中旅行的少年。
少年在經歷了無數冒險後，逐漸成長成了青年，
踏上了繼承父親理想，尋找“天空的勇者”的旅程

感受主人公所經歷的“波瀾萬丈的人生”。
歷經祖孫三代的宏大故事在智能手機上復蘇。

◆遊戲特色
・怪物夥伴系統
作為敵人與主人公戰鬥的怪物，這回將成為夥伴！
只有怪物才能使用的特技和各種咒文，將做出非常出色的表現。

・夥伴對話
可以體驗與個性豐富的夥伴們在冒險中對話的樂趣。
對話的內容會根據遊戲的進展和狀況發生各種變化！

・３６０度旋轉地圖
在鎮子和城堡中可以使地圖３６０度旋轉。
如果旋轉起來觀察的話，說不定會有新的發現？！

・ＡＩ戰鬥
值得信賴的夥伴們可以通過自己的意志進行戰鬥。
根據不同狀況使用各種“作戦”，去面對強大的敵人吧！

・賭場
有老虎機、撲克、怪物格鬥場、史萊姆賽跑這些熟悉的娛樂要素。
在漫長的旅途中也勞逸結合地娛樂一下吧。
賺到的代幣還可以兌換道具，可謂是一箭雙雕！

・雙六台
在投擲骰子，使自己成為棋子前進的巨大“雙六台”中，
在駐足的格子中會發生各種各樣的事件。
裡面還有只有在“雙六”中才能體驗到的特殊事件？！
順利走到終點的話，還可以得到稀有的道具哦！！

・觸摸史萊姆
在任天堂DS版《DQV》中登場的“觸摸史萊姆”還健在！
觸擊在一定時間內顯示的與面板顏色相同的史萊姆的非常簡單的遊戲！
不過，因而玩得入了迷的話，就會忘記時間，難以自拔。真是個高深莫測的遊戲！

--------------------
【適用OS】
iOS11.0以上

【適用機型】
iPhone5S／iPod touch(第6代)／iPad(第5代) 以上

hk.description:
--

獲獎：
● 日本 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT | 官方入選
● 韓國 2020 釜山獨立遊戲節 (BIC Fest) | 最佳休閒獎
● 台灣 2020 巴哈姆特 ACG 創作大賽 | 銅賞

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。

hk.description:
Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you’re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more!

Key Features:

Baseball Action Like Never Before:
Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter’s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun!

Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay:
Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops!

Collectible Doodle Characters:
Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments.

Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun:
Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action!

Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound:
Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run.

Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure.

Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

Whether you’re a professional writer, doctor, lawyer, disabled or somehow prevented from traditional typing, Speech to text : Voice to text app will swiftly solve your transcription problems and help you achieve your writing goals today!

hk.description:
Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age.

Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets.

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive?

Bon voyage!


SCAVENGE & EVACUATE
With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy.

SURVIVE & DECIDE
Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you.

EXPLORE & CRAFT
Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure.

LEAD & PROTECT
As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

hk.description:
Dolores, Ted, Mary Jane and Timmy return to face the nuclear apocalypse in this new, remastered edition of the classic atomic adventure - 60 Seconds! Reatomized, featuring high resolution art support, refreshed 2D graphics and hand-drawn 3D textures, new interactive menu, improved UI system, a technical refresh, and of course... new content!

NEW GAMEPLAY MODE
Survival Challenges - unique, short storylines which will put your survival skills to the test!

NEW OPPORTUNITIES
to escape the wasteland in form of a storyline spanning across multiple playthroughs! Can you escape the wasteland in style?

NEW RELATIONSHIP SYSTEM
more stories and crazy interactions between the McDoodle family members!

NEW SOUNDS, ART AND UNLOCKABLE VISUAL CONTENT
allowing you to add a little color to your fallout shelter!

NEW ACHIEVEMENTS!

With only 60 seconds left to impact, go on a mad dash through the house in search of family members and useful supplies. Everything will be against you: time, your very own furniture, a house that's different every time you play, and the fundamental question... what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time, alive, is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

Good luck.

《籠中窺夢》是一款「視錯覺」解謎遊戲，由兩人工作室Optillusion開發完成。

遊戲的內容全部包含在一個神秘的立方體中，立方體的每個面都是一個獨立的世界：工廠，燈塔，遊樂園，教堂等等，他們之間看似毫不相關，實則交錯萬千，充滿了意想不到的關聯……

【燒腦視錯覺解謎】
發揮你的腦洞與想象力，找到那些平凡場景與物體之間的聯系，產生意想不到的奇妙互動，拼接，然後見證奇跡誕生。

【收集照片拼湊故事】
謎題背後，遊戲還有一個等待著被玩家們發現並反轉的故事。通過收集照片拼湊故事，試著解開它隱藏的真相吧。

【多重提示杜絕卡關】
遊戲包含多種解謎引導機製，包括最基礎的「視覺引導」，幫助你快速定位關鍵物品；而「文字提示」則可以幫你整理解謎思路；最後還有「視頻提示」，用終極手段保證你絕不會卡關。

【拿下獎章證明實力】
遊戲擁有 15 個成就，每個成就都對應著一個根據劇情設計的獨特獎章。如果你是解謎遊戲達人，那就用這些獎章來證明自己吧~

mo.description:
********************
勇者鬥惡龍天空系列的第二作，《勇者鬥惡龍V》隆重登場！
歷經祖孫三代的宏大故事將在智能手機上復蘇！
感受主人公所經歷的“波瀾萬丈的人生”！
本作是一次性買斷的！
在下載後，不需要再支付任何費用。
********************
◆序言
主人公是和父親帕帕斯一起在世界中旅行的少年。
少年在經歷了無數冒險後，逐漸成長成了青年，
踏上了繼承父親理想，尋找“天空的勇者”的旅程

感受主人公所經歷的“波瀾萬丈的人生”。
歷經祖孫三代的宏大故事在智能手機上復蘇。

◆遊戲特色
・怪物夥伴系統
作為敵人與主人公戰鬥的怪物，這回將成為夥伴！
只有怪物才能使用的特技和各種咒文，將做出非常出色的表現。

・夥伴對話
可以體驗與個性豐富的夥伴們在冒險中對話的樂趣。
對話的內容會根據遊戲的進展和狀況發生各種變化！

・３６０度旋轉地圖
在鎮子和城堡中可以使地圖３６０度旋轉。
如果旋轉起來觀察的話，說不定會有新的發現？！

・ＡＩ戰鬥
值得信賴的夥伴們可以通過自己的意志進行戰鬥。
根據不同狀況使用各種“作戦”，去面對強大的敵人吧！

・賭場
有老虎機、撲克、怪物格鬥場、史萊姆賽跑這些熟悉的娛樂要素。
在漫長的旅途中也勞逸結合地娛樂一下吧。
賺到的代幣還可以兌換道具，可謂是一箭雙雕！

・雙六台
在投擲骰子，使自己成為棋子前進的巨大“雙六台”中，
在駐足的格子中會發生各種各樣的事件。
裡面還有只有在“雙六”中才能體驗到的特殊事件？！
順利走到終點的話，還可以得到稀有的道具哦！！

・觸摸史萊姆
在任天堂DS版《DQV》中登場的“觸摸史萊姆”還健在！
觸擊在一定時間內顯示的與面板顏色相同的史萊姆的非常簡單的遊戲！
不過，因而玩得入了迷的話，就會忘記時間，難以自拔。真是個高深莫測的遊戲！

--------------------
【適用OS】
iOS11.0以上

【適用機型】
iPhone5S／iPod touch(第6代)／iPad(第5代) 以上

mo.description:
《Final Fantasy III》在iPhone上堂堂登場!

世界被黑暗所籠罩，光明正在逐漸消失。
被水晶所選中的4名少年少女即將踏上冒險的旅程。

《Final Fantasy III》是FF系列中第一款銷量突破百萬的作品，有著非常重大的紀念意義。
在本作中首次出現了能夠隨時根據狀況變更當前職業的“轉職系統”，以及能夠召喚出希瓦、巴哈姆特等召喚獸的“召喚魔法”，這些要素在之後的系列作品中也一直繼承了下去，並且已經成為了系列的最大特色之一。

在3D重製版中，所有圖像都以全新的3D面貌登場，再次為《FFIII》創下了新的紀錄。

·4名主角的角色設定與設計煥然一新，並追加了新的劇情。

·3D圖像使得劇情與戰鬥的表現形式更為豐富。

·改良了系統，使得職業特性更為明顯，遊戲平衡也更加方便遊戲。

·能夠隨時中斷遊戲，並且追加中斷存檔及自動封存，強化了存檔功能。

--------------------------------------------

智慧型手機版還進行了以下改進。

·圖像對應高解析度，事件劇情的構成煥然一新。

·配合觸屏操作調整了介面。

mo.description:
Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you’re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more!

Key Features:

Baseball Action Like Never Before:
Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter’s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun!

Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay:
Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops!

Collectible Doodle Characters:
Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments.

Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun:
Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action!

Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound:
Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run.

Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure.

Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

mo.description:
Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age.

Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets.

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive?

Bon voyage!


SCAVENGE & EVACUATE
With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy.

SURVIVE & DECIDE
Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you.

EXPLORE & CRAFT
Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure.

LEAD & PROTECT
As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

mo.description:
Dolores, Ted, Mary Jane and Timmy return to face the nuclear apocalypse in this new, remastered edition of the classic atomic adventure - 60 Seconds! Reatomized, featuring high resolution art support, refreshed 2D graphics and hand-drawn 3D textures, new interactive menu, improved UI system, a technical refresh, and of course... new content!

NEW GAMEPLAY MODE
Survival Challenges - unique, short storylines which will put your survival skills to the test!

NEW OPPORTUNITIES
to escape the wasteland in form of a storyline spanning across multiple playthroughs! Can you escape the wasteland in style?

NEW RELATIONSHIP SYSTEM
more stories and crazy interactions between the McDoodle family members!

NEW SOUNDS, ART AND UNLOCKABLE VISUAL CONTENT
allowing you to add a little color to your fallout shelter!

NEW ACHIEVEMENTS!

With only 60 seconds left to impact, go on a mad dash through the house in search of family members and useful supplies. Everything will be against you: time, your very own furniture, a house that's different every time you play, and the fundamental question... what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time, alive, is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

Good luck.

《籠中窺夢》是一款「視錯覺」解謎遊戲，由兩人工作室Optillusion開發完成。

遊戲的內容全部包含在一個神秘的立方體中，立方體的每個面都是一個獨立的世界：工廠，燈塔，遊樂園，教堂等等，他們之間看似毫不相關，實則交錯萬千，充滿了意想不到的關聯……

【燒腦視錯覺解謎】
發揮你的腦洞與想象力，找到那些平凡場景與物體之間的聯系，產生意想不到的奇妙互動，拼接，然後見證奇跡誕生。

【收集照片拼湊故事】
謎題背後，遊戲還有一個等待著被玩家們發現並反轉的故事。通過收集照片拼湊故事，試著解開它隱藏的真相吧。

【多重提示杜絕卡關】
遊戲包含多種解謎引導機製，包括最基礎的「視覺引導」，幫助你快速定位關鍵物品；而「文字提示」則可以幫你整理解謎思路；最後還有「視頻提示」，用終極手段保證你絕不會卡關。

【拿下獎章證明實力】
遊戲擁有 15 個成就，每個成就都對應著一個根據劇情設計的獨特獎章。如果你是解謎遊戲達人，那就用這些獎章來證明自己吧~

【聯系我們】

官方微博：@心動網絡 、@籠中窺夢-Moncage
官方郵箱：moncagethegame@gmail.com

tw.description:
********************
勇者鬥惡龍天空系列的第二作，《勇者鬥惡龍V》隆重登場！
歷經祖孫三代的宏大故事將在智能手機上復蘇！
感受主人公所經歷的“波瀾萬丈的人生”！
本作是一次性買斷的！
在下載後，不需要再支付任何費用。
********************
◆序言
主人公是和父親帕帕斯一起在世界中旅行的少年。
少年在經歷了無數冒險後，逐漸成長成了青年，
踏上了繼承父親理想，尋找“天空的勇者”的旅程

感受主人公所經歷的“波瀾萬丈的人生”。
歷經祖孫三代的宏大故事在智能手機上復蘇。

◆遊戲特色
・怪物夥伴系統
作為敵人與主人公戰鬥的怪物，這回將成為夥伴！
只有怪物才能使用的特技和各種咒文，將做出非常出色的表現。

・夥伴對話
可以體驗與個性豐富的夥伴們在冒險中對話的樂趣。
對話的內容會根據遊戲的進展和狀況發生各種變化！

・３６０度旋轉地圖
在鎮子和城堡中可以使地圖３６０度旋轉。
如果旋轉起來觀察的話，說不定會有新的發現？！

・ＡＩ戰鬥
值得信賴的夥伴們可以通過自己的意志進行戰鬥。
根據不同狀況使用各種“作戦”，去面對強大的敵人吧！

・賭場
有老虎機、撲克、怪物格鬥場、史萊姆賽跑這些熟悉的娛樂要素。
在漫長的旅途中也勞逸結合地娛樂一下吧。
賺到的代幣還可以兌換道具，可謂是一箭雙雕！

・雙六台
在投擲骰子，使自己成為棋子前進的巨大“雙六台”中，
在駐足的格子中會發生各種各樣的事件。
裡面還有只有在“雙六”中才能體驗到的特殊事件？！
順利走到終點的話，還可以得到稀有的道具哦！！

・觸摸史萊姆
在任天堂DS版《DQV》中登場的“觸摸史萊姆”還健在！
觸擊在一定時間內顯示的與面板顏色相同的史萊姆的非常簡單的遊戲！
不過，因而玩得入了迷的話，就會忘記時間，難以自拔。真是個高深莫測的遊戲！

--------------------
【適用OS】
iOS11.0以上

【適用機型】
iPhone5S／iPod touch(第6代)／iPad(第5代) 以上

tw.description:
《Final Fantasy III》在iPhone上堂堂登場!

世界被黑暗所籠罩，光明正在逐漸消失。
被水晶所選中的4名少年少女即將踏上冒險的旅程。

《Final Fantasy III》是FF系列中第一款銷量突破百萬的作品，有著非常重大的紀念意義。
在本作中首次出現了能夠隨時根據狀況變更當前職業的“轉職系統”，以及能夠召喚出希瓦、巴哈姆特等召喚獸的“召喚魔法”，這些要素在之後的系列作品中也一直繼承了下去，並且已經成為了系列的最大特色之一。

在3D重製版中，所有圖像都以全新的3D面貌登場，再次為《FFIII》創下了新的紀錄。

·4名主角的角色設定與設計煥然一新，並追加了新的劇情。

·3D圖像使得劇情與戰鬥的表現形式更為豐富。

·改良了系統，使得職業特性更為明顯，遊戲平衡也更加方便遊戲。

·能夠隨時中斷遊戲，並且追加中斷存檔及自動封存，強化了存檔功能。

--------------------------------------------

智慧型手機版還進行了以下改進。

·圖像對應高解析度，事件劇情的構成煥然一新。

·配合觸屏操作調整了介面。

·豐富了能夠鑒賞插圖及BGM的鑒賞模式。

·還更新了貫通職業後能獲得的頂級職業證書及莫古網路等深掘遊戲要素。

tw.description:
■故事
帝國曆211年，人們發現了新大陸。
您將作為移民的其中一人，以走遍這座大陸為目標。
同時，在移民們的城鎮新都――艾列比亞度過每一天。

■遊戲特徵
【透過每日的工作培育角色】
本作品中有20種以上的職業，以及超過100種與職業相關的工作。
由於可在體力勞動中鍛鍊肌力，或在動腦時鍛鍊魔力，
因此藉由工作的選擇，可培育出自己喜好的角色。

【熟練地管理以攻略迷宮】
道具、糧食、以及露營道具。
將這些行李塞進容量有限的背包，向城鎮外頭出發。
途中不僅會和魔物戰鬥，也會遇到惡劣的天氣、糧食腐敗之類的狀況吧。
此時，要繼續前進？設置帳篷休息？還是鼓起勇氣撤退呢？
一路作出判斷，並不斷地開拓未知的大陸吧！

【全新的戰鬥系統要素「3個CHA」】
在活用職業和技能的傳統回合制指令式戰鬥中，
加入了和同伴合作非常重要的獨特系統。
CHANGE敵人的狀態，累積CHAIN，利用CHANCE來重創敵人吧！

Step up to the plate and experience the most exciting and fun-filled baseball game with Doodle Baseball! Dive into a hand-drawn world where sports action meets creativity. From the thrill of pitching to the excitement of hitting home runs, every moment is packed with fast-paced, action-packed gameplay. Whether you’re a fan of traditional baseball, looking for a new twist on your favorite ball game, or an MLB game enthusiast, Doodle Baseball has everything you love about the sport and more!

Key Features:

Baseball Action Like Never Before:
Whether you're swinging for a home run or making the perfect pitch, Doodle Baseball brings all the heart-pounding action of a real baseball game. From the batter’s box to the backstop, every play is full of excitement. Perfect for fans of MLB games and casual baseball fun!

Simple & Addictive Sports Gameplay:
Easy-to-learn controls let players of all ages join in on the fun! Perfect your batting skills, steal bases, and pull off putouts with a flick of your finger. Whether you're playing solo or challenging friends in multiplayer PvP mode, the action never stops!

Collectible Doodle Characters:
Unlock a team of quirky, adorable characters, each with special abilities to help you dominate the diamond. Build your perfect baseball squad and take on opponents in thrilling online tournaments.

Baseball Simulation Meets Arcade Fun:
Enjoy a blend of realistic baseball mechanics and fast-paced arcade action. Swing for the fences, score big home runs, and lead your baseball team to victory in dynamic baseball challenges. A perfect blend for fans of both MLB-style realism and arcade action!

Charming Hand-Drawn Art & Sound:
Immerse yourself in a world of colorful, hand-drawn doodle graphics that bring the baseball diamond to life. With lively sound effects, energetic crowd cheers, and a catchy soundtrack, every game feels like a home run.

Get ready to step up to the plate, swing for the fences, and experience the thrill of Doodle Baseball the ultimate fun baseball game for fans of sports, simulation, and arcade action! Whether you're into MLB style realism or just love the excitement of a quick ball game, this is your go-to baseball adventure.

Download now and get ready for a home run experience like no other!

tw.description:
Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age.

Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets.

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive?

Bon voyage!


SCAVENGE & EVACUATE
With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy.

SURVIVE & DECIDE
Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you.

EXPLORE & CRAFT
Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure.

LEAD & PROTECT
As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

tw.description:
Dolores, Ted, Mary Jane and Timmy return to face the nuclear apocalypse in this new, remastered edition of the classic atomic adventure - 60 Seconds! Reatomized, featuring high resolution art support, refreshed 2D graphics and hand-drawn 3D textures, new interactive menu, improved UI system, a technical refresh, and of course... new content!

NEW GAMEPLAY MODE
Survival Challenges - unique, short storylines which will put your survival skills to the test!

NEW OPPORTUNITIES
to escape the wasteland in form of a storyline spanning across multiple playthroughs! Can you escape the wasteland in style?

NEW RELATIONSHIP SYSTEM
more stories and crazy interactions between the McDoodle family members!

NEW SOUNDS, ART AND UNLOCKABLE VISUAL CONTENT
allowing you to add a little color to your fallout shelter!

NEW ACHIEVEMENTS!

With only 60 seconds left to impact, go on a mad dash through the house in search of family members and useful supplies. Everything will be against you: time, your very own furniture, a house that's different every time you play, and the fundamental question... what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time, alive, is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

Good luck.

《籠中窺夢》是一款「視錯覺」解謎遊戲，由兩人工作室Optillusion開發完成。

遊戲的內容全部包含在一個神秘的立方體中，立方體的每個面都是一個獨立的世界：工廠，燈塔，遊樂園，教堂等等，他們之間看似毫不相關，實則交錯萬千，充滿了意想不到的關聯……

【燒腦視錯覺解謎】
發揮你的腦洞與想象力，找到那些平凡場景與物體之間的聯系，產生意想不到的奇妙互動，拼接，然後見證奇跡誕生。

【收集照片拼湊故事】
謎題背後，遊戲還有一個等待著被玩家們發現並反轉的故事。通過收集照片拼湊故事，試著解開它隱藏的真相吧。

【多重提示杜絕卡關】
遊戲包含多種解謎引導機製，包括最基礎的「視覺引導」，幫助你快速定位關鍵物品；而「文字提示」則可以幫你整理解謎思路；最後還有「視頻提示」，用終極手段保證你絕不會卡關。

【拿下獎章證明實力】
遊戲擁有 15 個成就，每個成就都對應著一個根據劇情設計的獨特獎章。如果你是解謎遊戲達人，那就用這些獎章來證明自己吧~

us.description:
********************
This grand adventure, unfolding over three generations, is now available to play in the palm of your hand!
Take your place among a family of heroes, sharing in all the triumphs and tragedies of their storied lives!

Enjoy three generations’ worth of adventure in one standalone package!
There will be a fee to download the game but download it once, and there’s nothing else to buy, and nothing else to download!
*In-game text is available in English only.
********************

◆Prologue
Our hero begins the story as a small boy, travelling the world with his father, Pankraz.
Over the course of his many adventures, this lovable lad learns and grows.
And when he finally becomes a man, he resolves to continue his father’s unfinished quest—to find the Legendary Hero...

This thrilling tale on a stunning scale can now be enjoyed on pocket-sized devices!

◆Game Feature
・Make Friends with Mighty Monsters!
The fearsome monsters you face in battle can now become your friends, giving you access to unique spells and abilities—and a whole host of strategic possibilities!

・Converse Freely with your Fellow Party Members!
The party chat function allows you to converse freely with the cast of colourful characters who will accompany you on your adventure. So don’t hesitate to turn to them for advice and idle chit-chat whenever the urge assails you!

・360-Degree Views
Rotate your viewpoint in towns and villages through a full 360 degrees to make sure you don’t miss a thing!

・AI Battles 
Tired of giving orders?  Your faithful companions can be instructed to fight automatically!

When darkness falls and the land is robbed of light, four youths are chosen by the crystals to embark upon a journey to save the world.

A Simple Time Management App That Will Increase Your Productivity

Keeping yourself focused on tasks can be not easy sometimes. FocusDots is a beautifully designed timer to improve your focus on tasks and discard activity that can divert your attention. 

FocusDots is a simple time management app with four easy steps:

us.description:
Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age.

Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets.

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive?

Bon voyage!


SCAVENGE & EVACUATE
With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy.

SURVIVE & DECIDE
Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you.

EXPLORE & CRAFT
Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure.

LEAD & PROTECT
As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

us.description:
Dolores, Ted, Mary Jane and Timmy return to face the nuclear apocalypse in this new, remastered edition of the classic atomic adventure - 60 Seconds! Reatomized, featuring high resolution art support, refreshed 2D graphics and hand-drawn 3D textures, new interactive menu, improved UI system, a technical refresh, and of course... new content!

NEW GAMEPLAY MODE
Survival Challenges - unique, short storylines which will put your survival skills to the test!

NEW OPPORTUNITIES
to escape the wasteland in form of a storyline spanning across multiple playthroughs! Can you escape the wasteland in style?

NEW RELATIONSHIP SYSTEM
more stories and crazy interactions between the McDoodle family members!

NEW SOUNDS, ART AND UNLOCKABLE VISUAL CONTENT
allowing you to add a little color to your fallout shelter!

NEW ACHIEVEMENTS!

With only 60 seconds left to impact, go on a mad dash through the house in search of family members and useful supplies. Everything will be against you: time, your very own furniture, a house that's different every time you play, and the fundamental question... what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time, alive, is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

Good luck.

Moncage is a stunning vignette puzzle adventure developed by Optillusion. 

The game takes place inside a mysterious cube, with each side of the cube housing a unique world: be it an old factory, a light tower, an amusement park, or a church, etc. At first sight, they may seem random and unrelated, but upon closer look, you will become mesmerized by the subtle and intricate ways of how these worlds connect…  

【Solve Puzzles with Mind-Boggling Optical Illusions】
Use your imagination and spare no brain cells to find the connection and pinpoint every possible interaction between different sides of the cube, then watch as the magic unfold in front of you.

【Collect All Photos to Unveil the Story】
Behind the puzzles, there lies a story with a surprising twist for the player to uncover. Collect the photos from obscure corners and angles to reveal the underlying story, one photo at a time.

【Get Unstuck with Thoughtful Hints】
There is a multitude of guidance systems to help prevent players from getting stuck. Focus can be activated to highlight the key items to the solution, while hint texts are available to provide further clarity. And, if all else fails, video walkthroughs can be unlocked as the ultimate safety plan. 

【Prove Your Puzzle-Solving Skills with Medals】
There are a total of 15 achievements in the game, each corresponding with a Medal that has been crafted with a uniquely stunning design. A complete collection of the 15 Medals could be the perfect evidence to attest to your master puzzle-solving skills~

【Connect with us:】

Email: moncagethegame@gmail.com

us.description:
You are reading this text.
 But why?
 Are you looking for a game,
 or has the game found you?
 Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game.
 It is a simulation of creating a new reality.
 Will you shape faith,
 or will faith shape you?
 Humanity has always sought light in the darkness.
 It has always longed to believe in something greater,
 something that gives meaning to existence.
 That’s how religions were born –
 as beacons in the storms of history,
 as compasses in the ocean of life.
 What if you become the creator of a religion?
 What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality?
You are the Creator.
 You are the source.
 You are the inspiration.
 And if you are reading this text – you’re already in the game!
 All that’s left is to install – and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions!

 Become the source of faith – in the strategy simulator Religion Inc.

 Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness.

 There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity.

Game Features
*A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions!
*Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more!
*Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours!
*Hundreds of real-world religious aspects – and even more to come! Learn more about world religions!
*Unique active abilities for each archetype – perform miracles and change the world!
*Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy!

Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator – Religion Inc.

Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

tr.description:
Final Fantasy III -- now on iPhone!

When darkness falls and the land is robbed of light, four youths are chosen by the crystals to embark upon a journey to save the world.

FINAL FANTASY III was the first title in the FINAL FANTASY series to become a million-seller, establishing once and for all that Square Enix's classic RPG saga was here to stay.

A hallmark of innovation for the entire series, FINAL FANTASY III incorporates not only a job system that lets characters change classes at any time to the ability to summon powerful creatures such as Shiva and Bahamut.

The 3D remake of FINAL FANTASY III, with fully-rendered 3D graphics, duplicated the original's success.

- The four protagonists have been completely redesigned and new scenarios have been added.

- The 3D remake has really brought the cutscenes and battles to life.

- The Job system has been improved to bring out its best and most unique aspects, resulting in a more balanced game that is easy to enjoy.

- New save functions, including autosave, allow for players to quit the game at any time without fear of losing their progress.

--------------------------------------------

Aditionally, the smartphone version has been improved to include the following:

- High resolution graphics and retouched cutscenes.

- Smooth, intuitive touch-panel controls specifically tailored to improve the gaming experience.

- Gallery Mode, where players can view  illustrations from the game  or listen to the soundtrack, has been added.

- New visual designs for the Job Mastery Cards and the Mognet .

tr.description:
Journey to the forgotten past, to the far future, and to the end of time. A big adventure to save the planet, now begins…

CHRONO TRIGGER is the timeless role-playing classic developed by the ‘Dream Team’ of DRAGON QUEST creator Yuji Horii, Dragon Ball creator Akira Toriyama, and the creators of FINAL FANTASY. As the story unfolds, embark on a journey to different eras: the present, the middle ages, the future, prehistory, and ancient times! Whether you're a first-time player or a longtime fan, this epic quest to save a planet's future promises hours of enthralling adventure!

As the definitive version of CHRONO TRIGGER, not only have the controls been updated, the graphics and sound have also been revamped to make your adventure even more fun and enjoyable to play. To complete your journey, also included is the mysterious ‘Dimensional Vortex’ dungeon and the forgotten ‘Lost Sanctum’ dungeon. Meet the challenges presented to you and long-lost secrets may be revealed...

Story:
A chance encounter amid the festivities of Guardia's Millennial Fair in Leene Square introduces our young hero, Crono, to a girl by the name of Marle. Deciding to explore the fair together, the two soon find themselves at an exhibition of the Telepod, the latest invention by Crono's longtime friend Lucca. Marle, fearless and brimming with curiosity, volunteers to assist in a demonstration. An unanticipated malfunction, however, sends her hurtling through a rift in the dimensions. Taking hold of the girl's pendant, Crono bravely follows in pursuit. But the world into which he emerges is the one of four centuries before. Journey to the forgotten past, the distant future, and even to the very End of Time. The epic quest to save a planet's future makes history once again.

Key features:

Active Time Battle Version 2
During battle, time will not stop, and you can enter commands when the character's gauge is full. The enemies' positions will change as time passes, so choose your actions based on any given situation.

‘Tech’ moves and combos
During battle, you can unleash special ‘Tech’ moves, including abilities and/or magic and characters can combine these abilities to unleash all new combo attacks which are unique to them. There are over 50 different types of combos that you can execute between two and three characters!

Experience the 'Dimensional Vortex' and the 'Lost Sanctum' dungeons
The Dimensional Vortex: a mysterious, ever-changing dungeon existing outside of space and time. What wonders await you at its center? The Lost Sanctum: enigmatic gates in prehistoric and medieval times will lead you to these forgotten chambers. Meet the challenges presented to you and long-lost secrets may be revealed...

Graphics and sound
While keeping the atmosphere of the original, the graphics have been updated in higher resolution. As for the sound and music, under the supervision of composer Yasunori Mitsuda, all songs have been updated for an even more immersive gameplay experience.

Autosave
In addition to saving at a save point or choosing to quit from the menu, your progress is saved automatically while traversing the map.

--------------------------------------------

tr.description:
■Story
In the year 211 of the Imperial Era, a new continent was discovered. Explore its every last corner as a settler of Antoecia, while living your life to the fullest in the city of Erebia.

■Features 
• Character growth through everyday work
VARIOUS DAYLIFE features over 20 job classes and more than 100 types of work for those jobs to perform. Since you’ll be able to increase your strength through physical labor or improve your magic with more mentally taxing tasks, you can shape your character how you see fit depending on your choice of work.

• Overcome dungeons with skilled management
Choose what limited rations, items and camping gear you can pack in your bags as you leave the safety of the city to confront the unknown. You'll battle monsters, bad weather, and food spoilage out on the various frontiers of Antoecia. When the going gets tough, will you press onward, or retreat to explore another day?
You’ll have to make these kinds of decisions as you trailblaze a way across the continent, where none have trod before.

• Innovative Battle System – The Three CHAs
Introducing a twist to the traditional job-and-ability, turn-based battle, with a unique system that relies heavily on working together with your allies. CHANGE your foes' conditions, build up a CHAIN of attacks and seize your CHANCE at inflicting heavy damage!

About:
Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves.

There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms.

To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move.

Features:
● Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban
● 150 handcrafted rooms
● Fantasy themed pixel art
● Non-linear dungeon map

A Simple Time Management App That Will Increase Your Productivity

Keeping yourself focused on tasks can be not easy sometimes. FocusDots is a beautifully designed timer to improve your focus on tasks and discard activity that can divert your attention. 

FocusDots is a simple time management app with four easy steps:
1) Decide on a single task to be done.
2) Start FocusDots and work on the task until the timer finishes (25 minutes).
3) Take a short break (5 minutes).
4) After completing four Dots, go for a longer break (15 minutes)

tr.description:
Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age.

Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets.

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive?

Bon voyage!


SCAVENGE & EVACUATE
With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy.

SURVIVE & DECIDE
Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you.

EXPLORE & CRAFT
Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure.

LEAD & PROTECT
As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

Moncage is a stunning vignette puzzle adventure developed by Optillusion. 

The game takes place inside a mysterious cube, with each side of the cube housing a unique world: be it an old factory, a light tower, an amusement park, or a church, etc. At first sight, they may seem random and unrelated, but upon closer look, you will become mesmerized by the subtle and intricate ways of how these worlds connect…  

【Solve Puzzles with Mind-Boggling Optical Illusions】
Use your imagination and spare no brain cells to find the connection and pinpoint every possible interaction between different sides of the cube, then watch as the magic unfold in front of you.

【Collect All Photos to Unveil the Story】
Behind the puzzles, there lies a story with a surprising twist for the player to uncover. Collect the photos from obscure corners and angles to reveal the underlying story, one photo at a time.

【Get Unstuck with Thoughtful Hints】
There is a multitude of guidance systems to help prevent players from getting stuck. Focus can be activated to highlight the key items to the solution, while hint texts are available to provide further clarity. And, if all else fails, video walkthroughs can be unlocked as the ultimate safety plan. 

【Prove Your Puzzle-Solving Skills with Medals】
There are a total of 15 achievements in the game, each corresponding with a Medal that has been crafted with a uniquely stunning design. A complete collection of the 15 Medals could be the perfect evidence to attest to your master puzzle-solving skills~

Twitter: @MoncageTheGame
Email: moncagethegame@gmail.com
